00015 #include "ui_lockinampform.h"

00020 #include <QStatusBar>
00021 
00022 XLIA::XLIA(const char *name, bool runtime, 
00023            const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00024            const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00025            const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,
00026            const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &drivers) : 
00027     XPrimaryDriver(name, runtime, scalarentries, interfaces, thermometers, drivers),
00028     m_valueX(create<XScalarEntry>("ValueX", false, 
00029                                   dynamic_pointer_cast<XDriver>(shared_from_this()))),
00030     m_valueY(create<XScalarEntry>("ValueY", false, 
00031                                   dynamic_pointer_cast<XDriver>(shared_from_this()))),
00032     m_output(create<XDoubleNode>("Output", false)),
00033     m_frequency(create<XDoubleNode>("Frequency", false)),
00034     m_sensitivity(create<XComboNode>("Sensitivity", false, true)),
00035     m_timeConst(create<XComboNode>("TimeConst", false, true)),
00036     m_autoScaleX(create<XBoolNode>("AutoScaleX", false)),
00037     m_autoScaleY(create<XBoolNode>("AutoScaleY", false)),
00038     m_fetchFreq(create<XDoubleNode>("FetchFreq", false)),
00039     m_form(new FrmLIA(g_pFrmMain))
00040 {
00041     fetchFreq()->value(1);
00042   
00043     scalarentries->insert(m_valueX);
00044     scalarentries->insert(m_valueY);
00045 
00046     m_form->statusBar()->hide();
00047     m_form->setWindowTitle(i18n("Lock-in-Amp - ") + getLabel() );
00048 
00049     m_output->setUIEnabled(false);
00050     m_frequency->setUIEnabled(false);
00051     m_sensitivity->setUIEnabled(false);
00052     m_timeConst->setUIEnabled(false);
00053     m_autoScaleX->setUIEnabled(false);
00054     m_autoScaleY->setUIEnabled(false);
00055     m_fetchFreq->setUIEnabled(false);
00056 
00057     m_conSens = xqcon_create<XQComboBoxConnector>(m_sensitivity, m_form->m_cmbSens);
00058     m_conTimeConst = xqcon_create<XQComboBoxConnector>(m_timeConst, m_form->m_cmbTimeConst);
00059     m_conFreq = xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>(m_frequency, m_form->m_edFreq);
00060     m_conOutput = xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>(m_output, m_form->m_edOutput);
00061     m_conAutoScaleX = xqcon_create<XQToggleButtonConnector>(m_autoScaleX, m_form->m_ckbAutoScaleX);
00062     m_conAutoScaleY = xqcon_create<XQToggleButtonConnector>(m_autoScaleY, m_form->m_ckbAutoScaleY);
00063     m_conFetchFreq = xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>(m_fetchFreq, m_form->m_edFetchFreq);
00064 }
00065 
00066 void
00067 XLIA::showForms() {
00068 //! impliment form->show() here
00069     m_form->show();
00070     m_form->raise();
00071 }
00072 
00073 void
00074 XLIA::start()
00075 {
00076     m_thread.reset(new XThread<XLIA>(shared_from_this(), &XLIA::execute));
00077     m_thread->resume();
00078     m_output->setUIEnabled(true);
00079     m_frequency->setUIEnabled(true);
00080     m_sensitivity->setUIEnabled(true);
00081     m_timeConst->setUIEnabled(true);
00082     m_autoScaleX->setUIEnabled(true);
00083     m_autoScaleY->setUIEnabled(true);
00084     m_fetchFreq->setUIEnabled(true);
00085         
00086 }
00087 void
00088 XLIA::stop()
00089 {  
00090     m_output->setUIEnabled(false);
00091     m_frequency->setUIEnabled(false);
00092     m_sensitivity->setUIEnabled(false);
00093     m_timeConst->setUIEnabled(false);
00094     m_autoScaleX->setUIEnabled(false);
00095     m_autoScaleY->setUIEnabled(false);
00096     m_fetchFreq->setUIEnabled(false);
00097     
00098     if(m_thread) m_thread->terminate();
00099 //    m_thread->waitFor();
00100 //  thread must do interface()->close() at the end
00101 }
00102 
00103 void
00104 XLIA::analyzeRaw() throw (XRecordError&)
00105 {
00106     double x, y;
00107     x = pop<double>();
00108     y = pop<double>();
00109     m_valueX->value(x);
00110     m_valueY->value(y);
00111 }
00112 void
00113 XLIA::visualize()
00114 {
00115     //! impliment extra codes which do not need write-lock of record
00116     //! record is read-locked
00117 }

00119 void 
00120 XLIA::onOutputChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &)
00121 {
00122     try {
00123         changeOutput(*output());
00124     }
00125     catch (XKameError& e) {
00126         e.print(getLabel() + " " + i18n("Error while changing output, "));
00127         return;
00128     }
00129 }
00130 void 
00131 XLIA::onFreqChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &)
00132 {
00133     try {
00134         changeFreq(*frequency());
00135     }
00136     catch (XKameError& e) {
00137         e.print(getLabel() + " " + i18n("Error while changing frequency, "));
00138         return;
00139     }
00140 }
00141 void 
00142 XLIA::onSensitivityChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &)
00143 {
00144     try {
00145         changeSensitivity(*sensitivity());
00146     }
00147     catch (XKameError& e) {
00148         e.print(getLabel() + " " + i18n("Error while changing sensitivity, "));
00149         return;
00150     }
00151 }
00152 void 
00153 XLIA::onTimeConstChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &)
00154 {
00155     try {
00156         changeTimeConst(*timeConst());
00157     }
00158     catch (XKameError& e) {
00159         e.print(getLabel() + " " + i18n("Error while changing time const., "));
00160         return;
00161     }
00162 }
00163 
00164 void *
00165 XLIA::execute(const atomic<bool> &terminated)
00166 {
00167 
00168     m_lsnOutput = output()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00169         shared_from_this(), &XLIA::onOutputChanged);
00170     m_lsnFreq = frequency()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00171         shared_from_this(), &XLIA::onFreqChanged);
00172     m_lsnSens = sensitivity()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00173         shared_from_this(), &XLIA::onSensitivityChanged);
00174     m_lsnTimeConst = timeConst()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00175         shared_from_this(), &XLIA::onTimeConstChanged);
00176 
00177     while(!terminated)
00178     {
00179         double fetch_freq = *fetchFreq();
00180         double wait = 0;
00181         if(fetch_freq > 0) {
00182             sscanf(timeConst()->to_str().c_str(), "%lf", &wait);
00183             wait *= 1000.0 / fetch_freq;
00184         }
00185         if(wait > 0) msecsleep(lrint(wait));
00186       
00187         double x, y;
00188         XTime time_awared = XTime::now();
00189         // try/catch exception of communication errors
00190         try {
00191             get(&x, &y);
00192         }
00193         catch (XKameError &e) {
00194             e.print(getLabel() + " " + i18n("Read Error, "));
00195             continue;
00196         }
00197         clearRaw();
00198         push(x);
00199         push(y);
00200         finishWritingRaw(time_awared, XTime::now());
00201     }
00202   
00203     m_lsnOutput.reset();
00204     m_lsnFreq.reset();
00205     m_lsnSens.reset();
00206     m_lsnTimeConst.reset();
00207 
00208     afterStop();
00209     return NULL;
00210 }
